website_summaries.verdict: This set isn't ideal for all ages, but for kids who are ready to graduate to an advanced building kit, the instructions will walk them through constructing the ultimate roller coaster ride.
pros: An exciting set that tests kids' building skills as they construct an intricate, motorized thrill ride
Has cool graphics and comes with 809 pieces
Includes free access to the K'NEX Ride It!
cons: Too complicated for young children, and even some older kids may need parental assistance

customer_reviews.title: Fun project to do with my nephew
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to my 10yo we worked together to complete. I think it was a little much to do in one sitting but as he has a distructive younger brother we were afraid if we didn’t complete small pieces might go missing. My sister and daughter ended up joining us and while frustrating deciphering the graphics near the end(there’s just so many pieces it gets hard to tell what goes where) we enjoyed it and best of all it was quality time spent together with a fun outcome. I would purchase another project just maybe not attempt to complete on a school night! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: NEED MUCH BETTER INSTRUCTIONS/ PICTORIALS,  CONCERNING THE MANY CONNECTORS TO MAKE WORK
customer_reviews.text: Fun product for my 10 year old grandson, however, the manufacturer needs to improve the assembly instructions especially with the visuals for how to attach the many connectors and just the general assembly process... to much guessing if the product is being put together correctly, which causes to much tearing apart to try and get the product to work correctly or at all for that matter......
customer_reviews.author: c cheatham

customer_reviews.title: Pieces were flimsy and did not hold together.
customer_reviews.text: We built and rebuilt this 4 times. It never worked and pieces would not hold to keep track in place. The 1st one we bought the pieces were thicker and sturdier. Don't get this model.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip M

customer_reviews.title: it seems to be very dificult to get help with a simple problem.
customer_reviews.text: I'm simply missing one piece. It says to go to the back of the book for help. Lot of good that did. Just need one little piece sent so i can start. How do i get a missing piece for this?
customer_reviews.author: david u

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Design
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 10 yr old great nephew and he was able to build it in about 5 hours. He enjoyed it and was able to tweek it so that it worked terriffically. I would give this to even young people.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard R Smith

customer_reviews.title: Received in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift . . . haven't heard from the young man. So I assume all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my 10 year old very busy while working from home
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we expected and more. My daughter is busy everyday working on this set and she gets very excited each time she gets closer to finishing.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia "Jada" Powell

customer_reviews.title: Set was missing key pieces including car
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived clearly opened and it was missing multiple pieces including the car. We were able to build the track but then we couldn't do anything with it because we couldn't run the car through it.
customer_reviews.author: Ida H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coaster!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves k’nex’s. He was so excited to receive this for Christmas and put it together right away. The motor was definitely a selling point! It’s still sitting on display in our family room!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney T.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece because she loves to build things. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Tiny pieses
customer_reviews.text: Too many tiny pieces ,need patient to finish all parts
customer_reviews.author: Lihua

customer_reviews.title: Lowest price I found
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son it a great price
customer_reviews.author: betty m prusaitis

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly I had such a blast putting this together. Instructions where very helpful, but they must be done exactly.
customer_reviews.author: brittany gummo

customer_reviews.title: Probably closer to a 10-14 year old interest
customer_reviews.text: My oldest lost interest after about an hour and I admittedly lost interest after another hour, mainly because I'm a grownup and have a lot of things to tend to. :--) Quality seems fine and the picture directions are fine once you figure a few of the picture concepts out and get going. But my oldest is a Legos girl and she can put together some of the more complicated Lego sets with no problems, in perfect detail. If I had to do this all over again, I would have started her out with a significantly smaller K'NEX kit to gauge her interest, as we did with Legos. (And Mosaics)
customer_reviews.author: Dean!

customer_reviews.title: K-Nex is the Best
customer_reviews.text: K-Nex makes some of the most interesting and creative building sets around. My grandkids love them. This particular one is a challenge. It ends up taller than it looks, takes some time to lay out and figure out. An impressive set and gives kids a better challenge than video games certainly.
customer_reviews.author: Kug

customer_reviews.title: Encourages creativity
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is fascinated with roller coasters. He also has a talent for constructing, so this is perfect for him. He has several K'NEX sets and enjoys them very much. This one has a lot of pieces, giving them many options on what to build.
customer_reviews.author: reg

customer_reviews.title: Really fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the Kinex sets. They are a little tough to put together but worth it. Really like the moving parts. We have the Ferris wheel and three of the rollercoasters. All are great. Will get more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: another for the VR kiddo
customer_reviews.text: Love the challenge of having her have to build the set before she can kick into the app with her VR glasses. So much going on here and so many benefits - really great
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Zolar

customer_reviews.title: Great afternoon project
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to build and building this Knex was no exception. Took him a while, two afternoons really but he had fun!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Smart smart smart
customer_reviews.text: I have two boys one 11 and 16 and they really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

product_meta.title: K'NEX Thrill Rides – Bionic Blast Roller Coaster Building Set with Ride It! App – 809Piece – Ages 9+ Building Set
product_meta.description: Build it! and Ride it! with the K'NEX Thrill Rides Bionic Blast Roller Coaster with the K'NEX Ride It! app. Experience K'NEX Thrill Rides in a whole new way with this tech robot themed coaster perfect for boys or girls ages 7 and older. Build the Bionic Blast toy roller coaster with the included 809 K'NEX parts and pieces including coaster track, roller coaster car, motor and themed graphics! The rods and connectors click together to create a 3D configuration and a coaster that stands over 2.5 feet tall. The Bionic Blast Roller Coaster has a battery-powered motor and 2 Ferris wheels that move the coaster to the top of the hill, before it zooms through loops and curves. The coaster requires two AA batteries, which are not included. In a new twist to K'NEX Thrill Rides, upon completion of building the coaster, children can download the free K'NEX: Ride It! app to take their play to a brand-new level. Once downloaded, children can ride the Bionic Blast Roller Coaster using the included virtual reality, VR, viewer. Or, take building into the digital world! Rebuild the Bionic Blast in the app or create any coaster you can imagine. Once done building in the app, kids can then ride what they just built! The K'NEX: Ride it! app perfectly marries a hands-on building experience with a mobile app. This building set contains a full-color instruction sheet that walks your child through the process of building a coaster that will make your child want to start experimenting immediately. Promote the development of STEAM (science, technology, engineering, arts, and math) concepts by igniting your children's natural curiosity and creativity. Let them design, construct, and customize their own K'NEX models and enjoy hours of fun playing and learning with them. Get excited to Build It! and Ride It! with the Bionic Blast Roller Coaster Building Set, from K'NEX Thrill Rides!.
feature_bullets: CLASSIC THRILL RIDES EXPERIENCE – Build it! using the 809 K'NEX parts and pieces, plus MOTOR, to build an amazing coaster. Set includes coaster track, coaster car and tech robot themed graphics
A NEW WAY TO INTERACT – Once done building, download the FREE K'NEX Ride It! app to ride the Bionic Blast in virtual reality or digitally build the roller coaster of your dreams!
VR viewer included – ride Bionic blast in virtual reality with the included cardboard VR viewer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars93 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
